sn22.58:4.2: “* Tathāgato, bhikkhave, arahaṃ sammāsambuddho rūpassa nibbidā virāgā nirodhā anupādā vimutto sammāsambuddhoti vuccati.
sn22.58:4.3: Bhikkhupi, bhikkhave, paññāvimutto rūpassa nibbidā virāgā nirodhā anupādā vimutto paññāvimuttoti vuccati.
sn22.58:5.1: Tathāgato, bhikkhave, arahaṃ sammāsambuddho vedanāya nibbidā virāgā nirodhā anupādā vimutto sammāsambuddhoti vuccati.
sn22.58:5.2: Bhikkhupi, bhikkhave, paññāvimutto vedanāya nibbidā … pe …
sn22.58:6.3: viññāṇassa nibbidā virāgā nirodhā anupādā vimutto sammāsambuddhoti vuccati.
sn22.58:6.4: Bhikkhupi, bhikkhave, paññāvimutto viññāṇassa nibbidā virāgā nirodhā anupādā vimutto paññāvimuttoti vuccati.
sn22.58:7.1: Tatra kho, bhikkhave, ko viseso, ko adhippayāso, kiṃ nānākaraṇaṃ, tathāgatassa arahato sammāsambuddhassa paññāvimuttena bhikkhunā”ti?
sn22.58:7.3: Sādhu vata, bhante, bhagavantaññeva paṭibhātu etassa bhāsitassa attho.
sn22.58:7.5: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, suṇātha, sādhukaṃ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
sn22.58:7.6: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ.
sn22.58:8.1: * “Tathāgato, bhikkhave, arahaṃ sammāsambuddho anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā, asañjātassa maggassa sañjanetā, anakkhātassa maggassa akkhātā maggaññū, maggavidū, maggakovido;
sn22.58:8.2: maggānugā ca, bhikkhave, etarahi sāvakā viharanti pacchā samannāgatā.
sn22.58:8.3: Ayaṃ kho, bhikkhave, viseso, ayaṃ adhippayāso, idaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ tathāgatassa arahato sammāsambuddhassa paññāvimuttena bhikkhunā”ti.
